# sqh-image-component

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property       | Attribute      | Description                                 | Type      | Default     |
| -------------- | -------------- | ------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `alignment`    | `alignment`    | Configure alignment of the image            | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `borderradius` | `borderradius` | Configure border radius with pixel amount   | `number`  | `undefined` |
| `css`          | `css`          | Additional CSS applied to the image element | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `ishidden`     | `ishidden`     | Hide or show the component                  | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `url`          | `url`          | Image link                                  | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `width`        | `width`        | Image width                                 | `number`  | `undefined` |
